Arushi Goel

Currently a Graduate Research Student. Passionate about computer vision, machine learning, and exploring - ideas, books and places.

  G. Scholar LinkedIn Github e-Mail

My CV

• I am an Applied Scientist Intern at Amazon Alexa AI.

• I was a Research Engineer at A*STAR AI Initiative in Singapore.

• I was a research assistant at Nanyang Technological University in Prof. Lam Siew Kei's Lab.

• I did a research internship at University of Edinburgh with Prof. Bob Fisher.

• I am a second-year PhD student at the University of Edinburgh supervised by Prof. Hakan Bilen.

• I received a Electronics and Communication engineering degree from IIIT Allahabad, India.

• I use Python for efficient coding and testing. Previously, I have used MATLAB and C++ for development and prototyping.

• Want me to develop solutions for machine learning? I go for PyTorch and Tensorflow. Still I will play with Caffe and MATLAB, if projects ask me.

• If I have enough time, I love to look at Kaggle or other Data Science datasets and challenges.

• Hindi is my mother tongue.

• My English is proficient [ TOEFL score].
